title: Issue with Low Priority Queue.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Okay so I have been struck by the Leaverbuster, fine dandy I deserve it because I really did leave. Thats not the problem.

The Issue with my "Low Priority Queue" was supposed to be 20 minutes well as you can see by the link my wait times to find a match have been going up into the 50+ minute areas. As I type this I am still in that same queue it has reached 71:42. 

I have tried stopping and rejoining. Sometimes a game pops around 20-25 mins all other times it has done this. 

I all fine with taking my punishment but this is getting ridiculous. Over a hour waiting in queue's not sure when its gonna pop. 

I'm not sure if this is a bug or if Im missing something, if I am please let me know!
